mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_chat ( match_id, user_id, content, read_flag, created_date ) VALUES ( #{matchId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{readFlag}, #{createdDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, content, read_flag, created_date FROM tb_chat WHERE match_id = #{matchId} ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowNum}
